channel.title: [317]How To Add Shops[317]
channel.description: Hey guys I know the basic in coding but one of the basics I do not know is how to fully add a shops I'm using a Allstar-Scape base I know lame but it what I know for now... so I want to know how to add the whole thing I know something in Autospawn.cfg and Shops.cfg but it also goes in client.java but where and how thanks guys.

item.title: [317]How To Add Shops[317]
item.dc:creator: @Xillion Xillion
item.description:
@Xillion wrote:

Search for WanneShop = 1;

You should see something like this

if(NPCID == 710){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; }Now open up shops.cfg go to the last line, there are 43 shops for my server so my last line is shop = 43, if you have 43 shops then copy and paste the code above under its self so you should have

[code]if(NPCID == 710){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;
}

if(NPCID == 710){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;
}[/code]

Okay, now what you just copied and pasted change WanneShop = 1; to WanneShop = 44; now you can edit the if(NPCID == 710){ line to your new shop NPC ID.

That should be it…

Read full topic
